title: Flipped Learning & Self/Peer Assessment Integrated Course for Physics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: College-level physics fundamentals comprehension and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A non-degree short course in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, prioritizing practical problem-solving skills applicable to real-world tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze pre-learning materials provided through flipped learning and explain physics problem-solving steps with over 80% accuracy
Learners evaluate peers' problem-solving processes using peer assessment rubrics and achieve over 75% accuracy in three or more feedback iterations
Learners use self-assessment checklists to review their problem-solving strategies and demonstrate at least 20% performance improvement in final evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
